Title: Dracothian Guard Concussors
Legend: Foremost warriors of the Thunderwave echelon, Concussors and their Dracoth mounts are chosen for their raw brawn. Theirs is the task of humbling the foe ready for the ultimate strike, and their hammers are feared by all.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline in a Hammers of Sigmar army

Intro: Each model in a Dracothian Guard Concussors unit is armed with a Lightning Hammer.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thunderwave Echelon

Rules.Name: Elite
Rules.Rule: ELITE: Models in this unit can issue commands to their own unit.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Dracoths are each armed with a Stormblast and Claws and Fangs.

Rules.Name: Stormblast
Rules.Fluff: Dracoths can unleash the power of Sigmar’s storm from within their maws.
Rules.Rule: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Stormblast. Instead, roll a dice. On a 4+, the target suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Rules.Name: Blast To Ashes
Rules.Fluff: A well-swung lightning hammer unleashes its pent-up energies in a great blast, destroying everything it strikes.
Rules.Rule: Blast to Ashes: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Lightning Hammer is 6, the target suffers 2 mortal wounds and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
